title: 菊花賞の後に・白い大輪

text.jpText:
『菊花賞』で勝利し、秘密兵器から、
秘密ではない兵器になったと喜ぶ
タマモクロス。
text.enText:
Tamamo Cross is pleased with its victory in 
the "Kikka-sho" (Chrysanthemum Award) and its 
transformation from a secret weapon to a 
not-so-secret weapon.

text.jpText:
この経験は、同じく京都の長距離レースで
あり、父の思い入れのあるシニア級GⅠ
『天皇賞（春）』を走る予習にもなった。
text.enText:
This experience was also a preparation for 
running Tennou-sho (Spring), a long-distance 
race in Kyoto and a senior-level G1 race that 
my father is very fond of. This experience 
was also a preparation for running the 
Tennou-sho (Spring), a long distance race in 
Kyoto and a senior-level G1 race that my 
father is very fond of.
